properties.query:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where RegistryValueData =~ "DWORD (0x00000000)" and ActionType =~ "RegistryValueSet" and (RegistryKey endswith "\\Microsoft\\Windows\\DeviceGuard\\HypervisorEnforcedCodeIntegrity" or RegistryKey endswith "\\Control\\DeviceGuard\\HypervisorEnforcedCodeIntegrity" or RegistryKey endswith "\\Control\\DeviceGuard\\Scenarios\\HypervisorEnforcedCodeIntegrity\\Enabled")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects changes to the HypervisorEnforcedCodeIntegrity registry key and the "Enabled" value being set to 0 in order to disable the Hypervisor Enforced Code Integrity feature. This allows an attacker to load unsigned and untrusted code to be run in the ke
